game_description: Little Island offers you the experience of interacting with a variety of cute animals in a VR space. Dive into a world full of nature and adorable animal children. You will be healed by interacting with the lively animals. Help them in their time of need, play with them, and love them. Features: „ÉªBeautiful nature and interacting with lovely animals are healing you „ÉªBeautiful nature and interacting with lovely animals are healing you „ÉªA variety of 18 adorable animal children „ÉªFive unique locations where animals live, including forests and ice fields. „ÉªVarious items for playing with animals „ÉªFishing and growing flowers for relaxation.
review_1: I think this game has some potential to grow. Right now there is only a dog and a cat in a room. You can only feed them, lift them or pat them, or throw a ball to fetch. So they basically sell in the description, that is not there yet. It seems there is no way to unlock the locked features there yet. If there is, they should write a description how to open it. I'd wish the animals to be more authentic and the cat to behave like a cat instead of a dog. A cat wouldn't turn to the back and mew like a maniac. They should simulate some own wills, and characters for each animal, also some negative ones. But it looks like it could become like "nintendogs" in the future. So it should be supported üëçüèª
review_2: Have you ever wanted the highspeed, low latency snoot booping that only VR can quench, than this is for you. I watered turnips and played fetch with a puppy. My oculus has finally made it worth the buy. Also rappeling...
review_3: Im in love, this is such a sweet game full of cute baby animals! Id been looking for a good vr pet game and i found it with little island
